extendedInfo.description: Want your baby to fall asleep quickly? Just choose one of 5 wonderful lullabies, start timer and your kids will enjoy the best sleepy sounds.A lullaby is a soothing song (sounds for kids), usually sung to young children before they go to sleep, with the intention of speeding that process. As a result they are often simple and repetitive. Lullabies can be found in every culture and since the ancient period.+ only natural music+ relax and sleep sounds!+ high-quality soothing music+ best lullabies for kids, babies, children, infants, newborn+ lullaby ringtones and lullaby lyrics+ soothing music - sleep sounds+ absolutely relaxing and sleeping+ wonderful baby songs+ white noise for baby sleep+ therapy music (music therapy, sound therapy, melody therapy)+ best good quality sounds to sleep+ sounds for babies+ you will relax and sleep like baby+ christmas music+ children fall asleep immediately+ lullaby of nature+ sounds of letters+ sounds of the alphabet+ sounds of the womb+ deep relaxation with children songs+ baby sounds to sleep (baby songs, children songs, kid songs)+ baby music lullabies+ bedtime music (baby sounds, bedtime sounds)+ sounds of the alphabet+ christmas sounds+ nature appsFeatures:- install "Lullaby Relax & Sleep" to SD card- 5 different sleep sounds - possible set lullaby as ringtone- possible set lullaby as alarm- count down timer for music relaxation therapy- beautiful wallpaper for each lullaby- meditation music run in background- help to get rid of tinnitus- relaxation for children brains- only good quality nature sleep sounds for kids- relax melody samples- best lullaby children music (kid songs, newborn music, infant sounds)- nature noise maker- bedtime songs- baby sleep music- baby bedtime music box- baby sleep tracker- baby sleep log- sounds for babies- animal sounds- christmas songs- ambient sounds- sounds of the season- sounds of the gameMany of us can remember fondly those times when our mothers soothed us to sleep with a familiar song or two. Now, as adults, we often find ourselves in need of a soothing bedtime lullaby for our own little ones, but sometimes the name or even the lyrics elude us.No matter where on the planet or in what year you were born, your mother sang you a lullaby before putting you to sleep. Lullabies have existed throughout human history and some of the ones we sing to this day are hundreds of years old. Although no one is certain, it is believed that the name âlullabiesâ comes from the âlullâ-ing and âbyâ-ing sounds one makes to help a baby fall asleep. Others believe the term comes from a Hebrew phrase, âLilith-Abiâ meaning âLilith begone.â Lilith is a folkloric character who was believed to steal children in the night and these incantations were sounded to keep her away.Here are some popular lullabies and their origins.Brahmsâ Lullaby (lullaby music, bedtime sounds, sounds to relax and sounds to sleep)Originally titled âWeigenliedâ, this song is the most popular tune youâll find in baby mobiles or hear when a cartoon character gets knocked on the head. The tune was originally written for Bertha Faber, a young mother from Germany who wanted a new song to sing to her first newborn child.Rock-a-bye Baby (bedtime meditation)Bough breaks and cradles plunging from trees seem a little scary to sing about to a child, but itâs still one of the most famous lullabies around the world. There are a few different theories about the origin of this song. One is that it was written by English immigrants to America upon seeing Native American women rocking their babies in birch-bark cradles suspended from tree branches. Another theory is that it was written in the late 1700s about a family that lived in a tree and their children slept in hollowed out boughs. Regardless of its origins the words first appeared in Mother Gooseâs Melody in 1765.Good Night (Lullaby music for babies)A more modern lullaby, âGood Nightâ b

reviews.title: Great Sound, Great App
reviews.comment: The sound quality is top notch. Great song choices for a soothing bedtime, nap, feeding, or massage environment.
reviews.author: Stephan Seyfert

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Soothes my little one even when its not nap time this app calms him right down. I like how the melody keeps playing until you exit the app. Good job.
reviews.author: Rachel Meredith

reviews.title: My baby loves it!
reviews.comment: Nice app, would be good if you could lock the screen without the screen going off (htc desire hd). More songs too please :)
reviews.author: Aya S

reviews.title: Perfect for my music lover!!!
reviews.comment: The moment I turned it on his feet went nuts and he smiled at me like I did something grand...THANNNNKKKKKK UUUUUU now back to enjoyin mommy time during his nap time lol
reviews.author: jessica cormier

reviews.title: MOM AND DAD
reviews.comment: Omg.. I tryed so many app for my 1yr old to fall asleep, none worked but this one.. I LOVE IT. So recommend it. Trust me it will work my babygirl fell asleep in less then 5min.
reviews.author: Mayra Rodriguez

reviews.comment: It\'s work.I set for 10 minutes but within 5 minutes my daughter fall asleep.Thanks...I always have hard time to sleep my daughter.Took an hour n now only 5 minutes.Thanks to this application.Make my motherhood easy.
reviews.author: Catollyne Billy Ah Kau

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: Puts me and baby to sleep. It\'s not repetitive and it\'s very relaxing! You\'ll be happy you tried it!
reviews.author: Chelsea Lucero-Rubin

reviews.title: My Baby Girl & I Love It !!!!
reviews.comment: My baby girl turned a month old on July 11th and I just found this app while rocking her & within 5-10 mins of it playing she was asleep. Perfect app for bedtime 5 star \302\261\302\261\302\261\302\261+++++++++++ :-D
reviews.author: Jessi Pruitt

reviews.title: I love this app
reviews.comment: I love it
reviews.author: Jonte Weeks

reviews.title: Perrrrrrfect!!!!!
reviews.comment: For almost a week now it would take about 1 hour for my 10 month old son to go to sleep. Everything we tried did not work. Well, THIS DID!!!!! The rock a bye baby song on medium to low volume on my droid has put him to sleep 3 nights in a row. Try it! You have nothing to lose and rest/sleep of your own to gain.
reviews.author: jeffrey mayer

reviews.title: Nice and simple app
reviews.comment: Nice app with a good running time. Although only issue being the play back does not stop even if a call comes.
reviews.author: Varun Aggarwal

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Desde k tengo esta aplicacion ,  mi hijo duerme muy bien,  l pongo la musica y n 15 a 20 minutos esta dormidi ,  cuando antes pasaba mas d una hora y el no se dormia,!!
reviews.author: Judy Paredes

reviews.title: music
reviews.comment: Found this the other night when my 4 yr old couldn\'t fall asleep, worked right away. It just put her back to sleep right now!! Thank goodness because this mommy is very tired!!\"
reviews.author: Angie Avalos

reviews.title: The best!!
reviews.comment: If only I can give a million stars, Ill give it to you! This app is sooo great! Making my nephew sleep is so hard it will take an hour before he sleeps and by then Im really tired. But I downloaded this babe and within 10 minutes he fell asleep! Considering he just woke up 3 hrs ago. I bet he will wake up in the morning. Thanks to this app and its creator!!
reviews.author: Joybelle Vicente

reviews.title: Milano
reviews.comment: My six month old.quickly fell asleep. In less then ten minutes! Amazing! And my baby\'s teething and the music still put her to bed! Highly recommended!!!!!
reviews.author: Shay Sutton

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.comment: my baby sleeps easily bcoz of this app, if u could add more songs...
reviews.author: Jenerie Magtalas

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Simple but complete, nice set of songs, meets my needs when I need a lil help getting my lil one to sleep.
reviews.author: Virginia Zimmer

reviews.title: My baby loves this music but..
reviews.comment: Wish i could keep the pretty screens turned on so baby can watch it. Also wish there was a play all instead of just one song over and over, maybe i havent found that yet? Lol. These lullabys are perfect for getting my baby girl to calm down and go to sleep
reviews.author: Ferrin Bordelon

reviews.title: Too harsh
reviews.comment: These lullibys are played on instruments that are not gentle enough. The sounds jar me. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Christine Hendricks

reviews.title: Awesomee
reviews.comment: Before this app I use to spend hours sleeping my two year old!! Now with this app it\'s twenty minutes tops!! Get it I recommend it
